languages.text: "О стойкости, чтобы сопротивляться истязающим душу мою искусам".
"For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."
languages.original_text: "О стойкости, чтобы сопротивляться истязающим душу мою искусам".

traits.locale_text: "For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."
"For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."
"For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."
"For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."
"For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."

languages.text: "Um Tapferkeit, damit meine Seele den Verlockungen widersteht, die sie befallen haben."
languages.original_text: "For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."

traits.locale_text: "Um Tapferkeit, damit meine Seele den Verlockungen widersteht, die sie befallen haben."

languages.text: « Qu'Il m'accorde le courage, pour que mon âme résiste à la tentation. »
languages.original_text: "For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'Il m'accorde le courage, pour que mon âme résiste à la tentation. »

languages.text: 「不屈の精神を。{mf|俺|私}の魂が誘惑に打ち勝つために」
languages.original_text: "For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."

traits.locale_text: 「不屈の精神を。{mf|俺|私}の魂が誘惑に打ち勝つために」

languages.text: «La entereza necesaria para que mi alma resista las tentaciones que la asolan».
languages.original_text: "For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."

traits.locale_text: «La entereza necesaria para que mi alma resista las tentaciones que la asolan».

languages.text: “愿祂赐予我坚毅，让我的灵魂抵挡一切诱惑。”
languages.original_text: "For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."

traits.locale_text: “愿祂赐予我坚毅，让我的灵魂抵挡一切诱惑。”

languages.text: "Dirayet dilerim ki ruhum, etrafını saran ayartmalara karşı direnebilsin."
languages.original_text: "For fortitude, so that my soul may resist the temptations that beset it."
